Description: A man with many questions is on your vessel.
LevelDescriptionText: 1|He has asked you to take him to Hideaway~2|He has asked you to take him to the Salt Lions
ChangeDescriptionText: 1|He has asked you to take him to Hideaway.~2|He has asked you to take him to the Salt Lions.
Name: Hideaway: The Impolite Investigator
